sentences.sContent: It's a bit inconsiderate of her not to let you know when she expects to arrive.
sentences.sCn: 她不让你知道她什么时候会到，这样做有些不体谅人。

synos.tran: 轻率的；不顾别人的；无谋得

words.tran: 不替别人考虑地；考虑不周地；轻率地
不顾及他人；考虑不周；粗心

trans.tranCn: 轻率的；不顾别人的；无谋得
trans.tranOther: If you accuse someone of being inconsiderate, you mean that they do not take enough care over how their words or actions will affect other people
